content:
Web-public stream created by Morgan Rogers (he/him). Description:

A stream to handle all discussions of terminology, which tend to derail other conversations.
Morgan Rogers (he/him) changed the access permissions for this stream from Web-public to Public.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream general: terminology to general: terminology & notation.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

A stream to handle all discussions of terminology, which tend to derail other conversations.

  • New description:

A stream to handle all discussions on terminology and notation, which tend to derail other conversations.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream general: terminology & notation to practice: terminology & notation.
